ComicInfo.Summary: Death Pool Part 4: Sara is given the name of Victor Tabisch by one of her informants in a murder case and decides to return to Level 42 to confront Victor directly. Victor gives her a tour of the impressive complex but then sics a giant robot on her to gain more information on the powers of the Witchblade. When men are sent to kill Sara's source, Ian steps in and rescues her.
ComicInfo.Tags: Witchblade,Level 42,Julie Pezzini,New York City,Jake McCarthy,New York State,Lee Kim,Joe Siry,Vincent Pezzini,Death Pool,Victor Tabisch,Sara Pezzini,Ian Nottingham,Frank Bernard,Lisa Buzanis
